Paragraph: At dose levels of ( + ) - propranolol which attenuated the responses to isoprenaline , there was a significant prolongation of the PR interval of the electrocardiogram . 3 .

| Disease |
| --- |
| isoprenaline |

The only disease entity in the paragraph is "isoprenaline." It is a medication used to treat bradycardia (slow heart rate) and heart block, and it can also be used to diagnose certain heart conditions.

Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: At dose levels of ( + ) - propranolol which attenuated the responses to isoprenaline , there was a significant prolongation of the PR interval of the electrocardiogram . 3 .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| (+) - propranolol |
| isoprenaline |

In the given paragraph, the two chemical entities are "(-) - propranolol" and "isoprenaline". These entities are mentioned as substances that affect the responses to isoprenaline and cause a significant prolongation of the PR interval of the electrocardiogram.

The other term "PR interval" is not a chemical entity, but rather a measurement in electrocardiography.
